summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4647 for the improvement of West Blair Street, from 9th Avenue West to 10th Avenue West; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 54000, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
